entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet new` emits files with two periods before extension #29962
  • Whats the triage process here? #29960
  • Unable to build macos binaries on linux #29955

Closed

  • "dotnet tool restore" failing when run concurrently in CI -- DotnetToolSettings.xml locked #29535
  • Templates for `struct`, `enum`, `record` #28915
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2089789 #29964
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2089678 #29963
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix an issue with delegate declaration. Fix an issue with Simplifier and removing nullability. #29961
    Area-GenAPI

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #29952
    Area-Infrastructure
  • This call is failing on the Darwin leg in installer. (#29916) #29939

Updated

  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
  • Introduce Dependabot for updating the same dependencies used in dotnet/templating #29921
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29940
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29945
    Area-Infrastructure
